response.overview: ZEB IS BACK!!! Bigger! Harder! Hairy! BODY IMAGE PRODUCTIONS annouces the fi rst release from our SIGNATURE SERIES - showcasing BODY IMAGE SUPERSTARS - one at a time. Produced for the physique connoisseur, ZEB ATLAS completes many fantasies fi red-up by Zeb's fi rst solo scene in the “Top-Selling” BODY SOLO VOLUME 4. You'll see Zeb fl exing, posing and stroking in several scenes, with more muscle and all his natural body hair. Listen to Zeb talk about his workouts, goals and life after becoming one of the most sought-after muscle hunks in the history of male erotica. Plus there's a slideshow of Zeb sans hirsute, artfully captured by Ron Lloyd, the creative force behind BODY IMAGE PRODUCTIONS. This video is being released simultaneously with MEN MAGAZINE'S latest issue featuring an exclusive Zeb cover/ layout from BODY IMAGE PRODUCTIONS.
response.title: Signature Series: Zeb Atlas
